mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%H') AS hour,COUNT(comment_seq) AS count_write FROM csat_community_comment WHERE write_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND write_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), INTERVAL 1 day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%H')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%d') AS day,COUNT(comment_seq) AS count_write FROM csat_community_comment WHERE write_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym}, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND write_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym}, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 month) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%m') AS month,COUNT(comment_seq) AS count_write FROM csat_community_comment WHERE write_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '0101'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND write_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '0101'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 year) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(write_date, '%m')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO csat_community_comment(community_type_seq, community_seq, comment_seq, student_seq, content, write_date, use_yn) VALUES (#{communityTypeSequence}, #{communitySequence}, (select IFNULL(max(ccc.comment_seq),0)+1 as comment_seq from csat_community_comment ccc)), #{studentSequence}, #{content}, NOW(), 'Y')
